result.eng: The king's only son was killed.
result.html: Maraíodh aonmhac an ríThe king's only son was killed.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ aonṁac an ríThe king's only son was killed.

result.eng: Two people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ga: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.orig: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.html: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ beirt agus goineaḋ triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.
